title: Metromellow Terms and Conditions of Service

sections.title: Introduction and Background
content: Metromellow Ltd is a company that operates a digital, technology-driven service platform ('the Platform').
The Platform provides individuals and businesses ('Users' or 'Clients') with a range of domestic and lifestyle services.
Through the Platform, Users can conveniently access multiple categories of domestic and lifestyle services described in this Terms and Conditions of Service.

sections.title: References to Parties
listItems: All references to 'Metromellow', the 'Company', 'us' and 'we' in this Terms of Service (this 'Agreement') shall be deemed to mean Metromellow.

All references to the 'Platform' in this Agreement shall be deemed to mean the technology-driven service platform hosted by Metromellow on its website, mobile application and software platforms through which Metromellow offers a range of domestic and lifestyle services to Users.

All references to the 'User', 'Users', 'Clients', or 'You' in this Agreement shall be deemed to mean any individual, corporate entity, or organisation that accesses, registers on, or uses the Platform to request or receive services provided by Metromellow.

All references to 'Services' in this Agreement shall mean any of the on-demand domestic and lifestyle services offered by Metromellow, including professional cooking services, deep cleaning, laundry & care, and pest control services amongst others.

All references to 'Personnels' shall mean any individual engaged by Metromellow on a full-time, part-time, or contractual basis to deliver or support the Services to Users under the supervision and management of Metromellow.
All references to the 'Parties' in this Agreement shall be deemed to be a collective reference to 'Metromellow' and the 'Users'.

All references to 'Terms' and 'Agreement' shall mean this Terms and Conditions of Service, together with all Policies, Schedules and additional terms referenced or incorporated, as may be amended from time to time.

sections.title: Agreement to Terms
content: By clicking on the 'I agree' button on the Terms and Conditions segment of the Platform's registration or onboarding interface, it is deemed that you have read, understood and agree to be bound by the Terms set out in this Agreement.

By accepting this Agreement (on behalf of yourself or the entity that you represent), you represent and warrant that you have the right, authority, and capacity to enter into these terms (on behalf of yourself or the entity that you represent). You further represent that you are at least 18 years of age and that you are not a person barred from accessing the services rendered by Metromellow through its Platform under the laws of the Federal Republic of Nigeria or any other applicable jurisdictions.

By accepting this Agreement, you agree to the fact that Metromellow reserves the right to modify this Agreement at any time, at which point, you will be given a notice of the amendment or modification, and you shall be required to read and consent to the modified Agreement where you find the Agreement agreeable.

If you do not agree to the terms and conditions set out in this Agreement, it is agreed that you shall immediately stop using the services offered by Metromellow through the Platform and shall immediately indicate the withdrawal of your acceptance to this Agreement on the Interface provided on the Platform to deactivate or delete your user account.
We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, our Services or any part thereof with or without notice to you, or other users or clients.

The Terms and Conditions contained in this Agreement constitute the entire agreement between the Parties at the time the User accesses and uses the services and marketplace offered by Metromellow through the Platform, unless otherwise provided in another agreement entered into with Metromellow.

By registering on Metromellow or using any of the Services, the User represents and warrants that they meet this age requirement.

Users representing a company or business entities further represent that they have the authorisation to do so. Users who are restricted by law, court order, or regulatory sanction from contracting or using online platforms are not eligible to use the Platform.

content: To access and use the Platform or book Services, Users are required to create a personal account ('Account') by providing complete, accurate, and up-to-date information as requested by Metromellow. Users are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their login credentials, including usernames, passwords, payment information, banking details and verification codes. Metromellow shall not be liable for any unauthorised access or transactions carried out through a User's Account resulting from the User's failure to maintain adequate personal cybersecurity and confidentiality of login details.

Each User shall only maintain one Account on the Platform. Creation of multiple accounts by the same individual or entity, misrepresentation of identity, or impersonation of any person or organisation is strictly prohibited. Upon detection of multiple accounts, Metromellow reserves the right to merge, suspend, or permanently delete duplicate or fraudulent accounts without notice.
Metromellow reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to suspend or terminate any User Account without prior notice if:
listItems: any information provided by the User is false, misleading, or unverifiable;
the User engages in any fraudulent, abusive, or unlawful conduct;
the User violates these Terms, the Privacy Policy, or other applicable policies; or
such suspension or termination is required by law or regulatory directive.

sections.title: Know Your Customer (KYC) and Onboarding
content: To maintain the integrity and security of its operations, Metromellow conducts Know Your Customer (KYC) and onboarding verification for all Users registering on the Platform. All personal information collected under this Clause shall be processed and stored in compliance with the Nigeria Data Protection Act (NDPA) 2023, all applicable Nigerian data protection laws and Metromellow's Privacy Policy.

Metromellow reserves the right to restrict, suspend, or terminate any User Account where the Platform's KYC requirements are not satisfied or where the information provided is found to be false, misleading, or unverifiable. Users acknowledge that non-completion of the Platform's KYC process may limit their ability to access or use certain Services on the Platform.

It should be noted that the final prerogative to onboard a person or entity on the Platform lies solely with Metromellow and it may decide for any reason or no reason at any time to refuse to onboard a person on the Platform. Metromellow shall bear no liability for its refusal to onboard any person who applies to be onboard.

sections.title: Booking and Payment
content: All Services must be requested and confirmed exclusively through the Metromellow Platform via website, mobile application or software platforms. All bookings are subject to service availability in the User's location and confirmation by Metromellow.
**Pricing:** Prices for Services shall be displayed on the Platform and are quoted in Nigerian Naira (₦) unless otherwise stated.
Each booking may consist of one or more of the following fee components:
listItems: **Base Service Fee:** Standard charge for the category of service.
**Add-On Charges:** Additional fees for special requests, extended time, or consumables.
**Delivery or Transportation Charges:** Applicable for services requiring logistics.
**Taxes and Statutory Levies:** VAT or other mandatory charges.
contentAfterList: **Payments:** Except where expressly stated otherwise, all bookings must be prepaid in full at the time of confirmation. Payments can be made via debit/credit cards, bank transfers, verified mobile money platforms, or in-app wallets.

**Failed Payments & Chargebacks:** Unjustified chargebacks initiated through the User's bank or card issuer may result in immediate suspension of the User's Account, denial of future Services, and recovery of all associated costs. If a User's payment fails after Service performance has commenced, the outstanding amount shall become immediately due and payable.

sections.title: Refund, Cancellation and Compensation
content: Users may cancel a scheduled service subject to the following timelines and applicable fees:
contentAfterTable: **Metromellow Cancellations:** Metromellow may cancel a booking due to unforeseen circumstances (e.g., staff unavailability, Force Majeure). In such cases, Users shall be entitled to a refund, a rebooking at no additional cost, or Platform credit.

**Service Complaints:** Where a service is not performed to reasonable professional standards, Users may raise a complaint within **24 hours** of service completion. Complaints must be supported by evidence such as photos or written details.
**Processing:** Approved refunds are typically processed within 7 to 14 business days.

sections.title: Safety, Health and Compliance
content: Metromellow reserves the right to refuse, discontinue, or postpone any service where:
listItems: The premises or circumstances pose a health, safety, or security risk to its personnel;
The User fails to disclose hazards or comply with safety requirements;
Weather, environmental, or operational conditions render service performance unsafe.

sections.title: Client Protection Plan
content: This Plan provides a structured framework for resolving incidents of accidental damage or theft directly caused by Metromellow personnel during a scheduled service.
listItems: **Client Protection Fee:** Each booking attracts a mandatory, non-refundable Client Protection Fee of **₦ 1,000** (One thousand naira).
**Damage Coverage:** Coverage for accidental physical damage is limited to **₦ 50,000** (Fifty thousand naira) per incident. Metromellow reserves the right to first attempt professional repair.
**Theft Coverage:** Coverage for theft is limited to **₦ 50,000** (Fifty thousand naira) per incident. A valid police report is required.

**Exclusions:** The plan does not cover cash, jewellery, antiques, heirlooms, items of high sentimental value, normal wear and tear, or damage to delicate surfaces where handling instructions were not provided.
**Reporting:** Accidental Property Damage must be reported within **24 hours**. Theft must be reported to the Police and Metromellow within **48 hours**.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
content: Metromellow will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, punitive, consequential or exemplary damages which would include, but is not limited to, lost profits or data, goodwill, damage to reputation, injury or interruptions of service.

Metromellow's total cumulative liability for any accidental physical damage to property caused directly by Metromellow's Personnel during Service performance shall not exceed the total amount paid by the User for the specific booking giving rise to the claim or ₦50,000 (Fifty thousand naira) whichever is lower as prescribed under the Client Protection Plan.

sections.title: Dispute Resolution
content: **Arbitration Agreement:** By signing up to this Agreement, you and Metromellow mutually agree to waive your respective rights to resolution of disputes via litigation and agree to resolve any dispute conclusively by arbitration.
listItems: **Notice:** Before seeking arbitration, a party must send a written Notice of Dispute.
**Mediation:** If unresolved after 30 days, the dispute shall be referred to mediation under the Lagos State Multi-Door Courthouse.
**Arbitration:** If unresolved 30 days after mediation, the dispute refers to binding online ad-hoc arbitration in Lagos, Nigeria.
**Court Jurisdiction:** In circumstances where litigation is permitted, parties submit to the jurisdiction of the courts located within Lagos State.

sections.title: Allergies and Dietary Restrictions
content: Customers are required to disclose any known food allergies or dietary restrictions at the time of placing their Meal Order.
Metromellow cannot guarantee that any meal will be completely free from allergens.

sections.title: Refunds
content: No refunds will be issued once food preparation has commenced, except for delivery of wrong meals or food safety/contamination issues supported by evidence.
Refund requests must be submitted within **12 hours** of delivery.

sections.title: Delivery
content: Delivery timelines are estimates. Customers must ensure address accuracy.
If delivery fails due to User error, the order may be marked completed without refund.

sections.title: Scope of Service
content: Includes residential, corporate, and post-construction cleaning.

sections.title: Client Obligations
content: Provide safe access, running water, and electricity.
Secure valuables and disclose fragile items (e.g., marble, antiques) before service begins.

sections.title: Equipment
content: The Client shall supply cleaning equipment/tools unless they request Metromellow to supply them.

sections.title: Pricing
content: Estimates are based on factors like square footage.
Additional charges may apply for heavy soiling or post-construction debris.

sections.title: Disclaimer
content: Metromellow is not liable for normal wear and tear, damage to fragile items not disclosed, or pre-existing defects.

schedules.title: Schedule C: Laundry and Care Services

sections.title: Service Standard
content: Metromellow exercises reasonable care but does not guarantee the removal of all stains or odours.

sections.title: Client Obligations
content: Empty all pockets and remove detachable accessories before collection.
Inspect garments for pre-existing damage.

sections.title: Turnaround Time
content: Standard turnaround is 48 to 72 hours.

sections.title: Exclusions
content: Items like fur, leather, suede, wedding dresses, and carpets are excluded from standard service unless explicitly approved with additional fees.

sections.title: Uncollected Items
content: Metromellow is not liable for items uncollected after 30 days.

sections.title: Safety Precautions
content: Customers must disclose medical conditions, allergies, pets, or exposed food items before treatment.
Users must vacate the premises during fumigation if instructed.

sections.title: Service Disclaimer
content: Metromellow does not guarantee permanent eradication from a single treatment, as re-infestation may occur due to environmental factors.
Metromellow is not liable for health effects where safety instructions were followed.
